titleStmt.title: An alarum to arms, or, The Kings Majesties resolution to raise arms against all those that shall oppose or resist him in the suppressing the ordinance of Parliament concerning the militia whereunto is annexed the Parliaments resolution to raise forces to maintain the said ordinance, and to defend all those that shall stand for the maintenance of the same : the last news from Hull of sixty cavaliers slain by Sir John Hothams men.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
England and Wales. Parliament. Humble petition of the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled, to the Kings Most Excellent Majesty, 16 July 1642.
England and Wales. Parliament. Replication of the Lords and Comons assembled in Parliament to His Majesties last answer.

notesStmt.note: Entry for C2087 cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.).
